content:
Create a fully functional retro arcade game in a single HTML file. 

GAME LOGIC (PRIORITY #1):
- Proper game timing (use setInterval for game updates, NOT requestAnimationFrame for timing)
- Snake games: 150-200ms intervals for smooth playable speed
- Game state management with gameRunning boolean
- Proper collision detection and win/lose conditions
- Single clean game loop without recursive calls
- Keyboard controls: Arrow keys, SPACEBAR (pause), R (reset)
- Touch/swipe controls for mobile

STYLING (PRIORITY #2):
- Black background with neon colors (lime, cyan, magenta, yellow)
- Monospace font (Courier New)
- CSS glow effects (text-shadow, box-shadow)
- Visible controls panel showing all keyboard shortcuts
- Score display with localStorage persistence
- Mobile-responsive design

TECHNICAL:
- Single HTML file with embedded CSS/JS
- Viewport meta tag for mobile
- Prevent zoom/scroll on mobile
- 44px+ touch targets

Must wrap output in ```html code blocks only. No explanatory text.
